Package com.ibm.cloud.cloudant.security

package com.ibm.cloud.cloudant.security
This package contains security related API classes.
Since:
0.0
Version:
0.0
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    CouchDbSessionAuthenticator
    Implementation of Authenticator that provides authentication via the Apache CouchDB _session endpoint.
    CouchDbSessionAuthenticator.CouchDbSessionToken
    Implements TokenServerResponse for an Apache CouchDB session cookie.
